Source.DbCommandText: SELECT wf.Id, resprop.Value as Title, wf.Status, wf.PendingState, pendingProp.Value as PendingStateTitle, wf.PendingStateDueDate, wf.CreatedDate, wf.DueDate, wf.PagePath, assignee.Email as Assignee FROM AppCloud_Workflow wf LEFT OUTER JOIN AppCloud_User assignee ON wf.AssignedTo = assignee.Id LEFT OUTER JOIN AppCloud_Resource parentRes ON parentRes.ResourcePath = wf.WorkflowPath AND parentRes.Status=0 AND parentRes.ResourceType='root' LEFT OUTER JOIN AppCloud_Resource contentRes ON contentRes.ParentId = parentRes.Id AND contentRes.Status=0 AND contentRes.ResourceType='xapp:content' LEFT OUTER JOIN AppCloud_ResourceProperty resprop ON resprop.ResourceId = contentRes.Id AND resprop.Name = 'xapp:title' LEFT OUTER JOIN AppCloud_Resource pendingRes ON pendingRes.ResourcePath = wf.PendingResourcePath AND pendingRes.Status=0 AND pendingRes.ResourceType='xapp:content' LEFT OUTER JOIN AppCloud_ResourceProperty pendingProp ON pendingProp.ResourceId = pendingRes.Id AND pendingProp.Name = 'xapp:title' WHERE wf.ManagementType = 1 AND ( wf.AssignedTo = @UserId OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM AppCloud_WorkflowAssignee2User a2u WHERE a2u.UserId = @UserId AND a2u.WorkflowId = wf.Id AND a2u.StateId = wf.PendingState) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM AppCloud_User2Group u2g INNER JOIN AppCloud_WorkflowAssignee2Group a2g on a2g.GroupId = u2g.GroupId WHERE u2g.UserId = @UserId AND a2g.WorkflowId=wf.Id AND a2g.StateId = wf.PendingState) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM AppCloud_User2Organization u2o INNER JOIN AppCloud_WorkflowAssignee2Organization a2o on a2o.OrganizationId = u2o.OrganizationId WHERE u2o.UserId = @UserId AND a2o.WorkflowId = wf.Id AND a2o.StateId=wf.PendingState) ) AND (@Status <= 0 OR wf.Status = @Status ) AND (@Title = '' OR @Title IS NULL OR resprop.Value like '%' + @Title + '%') AND (@StartLowerDate IS NULL OR wf.CreatedDate > CAST(DATEADD(day,-1,@StartLowerDate) as DATE)) AND (@StartUpperDate IS NULL OR wf.CreatedDate < CAST(DATEADD(day,1,@StartUpperDate) as DATE)) AND (@EndLowerDate IS NULL OR wf.DueDate > CAST(DATEADD(day,-1,@EndLowerDate) as DATE)) AND (@EndUpperDate IS NULL OR wf.DueDate < CAST(DATEADD(day,1,@EndUpperDate) as DATE)) AND (@Deadline <= 0 OR wf.DueDate < CAST(DATEADD(day,@Deadline,GETDATE()) as DATE))
